Children.ScriptAction:
-- TODO: this is really old, predating Finmer itself... could probably replace gsubs with Text.SetContext
LogGsub("tutorial1",
    {instructor = instr_s,
    instrhis = instr_g.Possessive,
    instrhe = instr_g.Subject,
    instrHe = CapFirst(instr_g.Subject)})

trainingdummy = Creature("TrainingDummy1")
Log("tutorial3", tutcolor)
Log("tutorial4", tutcolor)
Combat.AddCombatant(trainingdummy)
Combat.OnRoundEnd(function()
    if trainingdummy.Health == trainingdummy.HealthMax then
        -- keep repeating "try hitting it" until that actually happens
        Log("tutorial4", tutcolor)
    elseif not fight1_hitConfirmed then
        -- "nice!"
        fight1_hitConfirmed = true
        Log("tutorial5", tutcolor)
    end
end)
Combat.OnCombatEnd(function()
    Sleep(0.1)
    LogGsub("tutorial6",
        {instructor = instr_s,
        instrhis = instr_g.Possessive,
        instrhe = instr_g.Subject,
        instrHe = CapFirst(instr_g.Subject)})
end)
Combat.Begin(false)

trainingdummy = Creature("TrainingDummy2")
Log("tutorial7", tutcolor)
Combat.AddCombatant(trainingdummy)
Combat.OnRoundEnd(function()
    if (not fight2_grappled) and trainingdummy:IsGrappling(Player) then
        -- vore tutorial
        fight2_grappled = true
        Log("tutorial8", tutcolor)
    end
    if (not fight2_swallowed) and trainingdummy:IsEatenBy(Player) then
        -- digestion tutorial
        fight2_swallowed = true
        Log(Player.EndoOnly and "tutorial9b" or "tutorial9", tutcolor)
    end
end)
Combat.Begin(false)
